definition: "knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
diamond/(used to translate Sanskrit "vajra", a thunderbolt or mythical weapon)/guardian deity (in Buddhist iconography)
diamond/(used to translate Sanskrit "vajra", a thunderbolt or mythical weapon)/guardian deity (in Buddhist iconography)
Cao Gangchuan (1935-), former artillery officer, senior PRC politician and army leader
diamond/also called 鑽石|钻石[zuan4 shi2]

sentences.english: The former scene by dinosaur was more wonderful than human's.
sentences.chinese: 剛退場的恐龍戲碼，就比我們精彩有趣得多了。

sentences.english: This is the new conveyor belt we had installed last year. We doubled our output in this department as result.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們剛安裝的輸送帶，使我們的產量提高了兩倍。

sentences.english: Don't be such a party pooper , the party has just started.
sentences.chinese: 不要那麼掃興，聚會纔剛剛開始。

sentences.english: In the first few years after I moved there, lotus flowers continued to blossom on the surface of the pond.
sentences.chinese: 剛搬來的幾年，池塘裏還有荷花。

sentences.english: Have you ever walked into a room after people have been fighting?
sentences.chinese: 你曾走進人們剛爭吵過之後的房間嗎？

sentences.english: Director Zhang solved an intricate case soon after he took his post.
sentences.chinese: 局長剛上任不久就將一件無頭案偵破了。

sentences.english: This is a Desert Wheatear for me, a fresh female.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲這是一隻剛換羽的漠即鳥母鳥。

sentences.english: Even with the hefty fees, the organization says it plans only to break even.
sentences.chinese: 即使收費如此巨大，機構稱它纔剛剛保本。

sentences.english: Yeah, the boss just asked me to take all my vacation days at once.
sentences.chinese: 是阿，老闆剛剛纔要我把還沒休的假一次休完。

sentences.english: The ball he put over at the start of the second half at Hull was like Beckham in his prime.
sentences.chinese: 對赫爾城下半場剛開始他射進的入球像極了貝克漢姆。

sentences.english: This woman just finished the farewell ceremony for his husband, came back home to want to accept a letter.
sentences.chinese: 這位婦女剛爲他先生辦完告別式，一回到家想收個信。

sentences.english: So I'm on the road a bit, and I hold meetings, sometimes at the client's place.
sentences.chinese: 我纔剛剛起步，有時候我在客戶提供的地點開會。

sentences.english: Seen under a microscope , a fresh snowflake has a delicate six-pointed shape.
sentences.chinese: 在顯微鏡下觀察，剛飄下的雪花呈精巧的六角形。

sentences.english: As they touched the earth, it was her twelve brothers, whom she had redeemed.
sentences.chinese: 牠們剛落地就變成了王后的十二個哥哥。

sentences.english: Tell him a bench has wet paint on it and he'llhave to touch to be sure.
sentences.chinese: 告訴他椅子剛漆過他非用手摸一下以確證。

sentences.english: The little penguin was born last month - and was instantly ill-treated by its parents.
sentences.chinese: 這隻小企鵝是在上個月出生的，剛落地就遭父母虐待。

definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
